channel.title: Posts on BD103's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on BD103's Blog

item.title: New Website
item.description: Hello, and welcome to my new website / blog! Why did you change? I (drastically) changed my website for a number of reasons. My old website had a weird style and never got updated I wanted a blog that I could actually use I saw Hugo used by a number of websites and got inspired What will this mean for the future? Look forward to new posts and updates :)
